snippet: Gov. PETE WILSON of California is deciding whether to sign a bill requiring that all motorcyclists wear helmets. And, true to their popular maverick image, the bikers are not in harmony on the issue.   Among 3,000 bikers protesting the bill on Sun...
lead_paragraph: Gov. PETE WILSON of California is deciding whether to sign a bill requiring that all motorcyclists wear helmets. And, true to their popular maverick image, the bikers are not in harmony on the issue. Among 3,000 bikers protesting the bill on Sunday at Los Angeles City Hall was the rocker BILLY IDOL. "The rider is the only one who knows when he's safe," he said, "not somebody sitting in the Legislature." He said he never wears a helmet, despite being badly hurt in a motorcycle accident.
